rows.label: qev050505_MSG0001
rows.name:
I am coming to learn that this business of food and
eating goes much deeper than ever I knew.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0002
rows.name:
And in those depths is a path into the very heart of a
man. In that, it is the same as the sword.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0003
rows.name:
I hope you will understand my passion in the pursuit of
mastery over this new form.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0004
rows.name: Ah, my good BLADE! I am ever in your debt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0005
rows.name: Have you gathered the recipes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0006
rows.name: Oh my...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0007
rows.name:
If I may...? Hmm... I see, I see...
Curry, Peking duck, and...potluck hot pot?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0008
rows.name:
How are these the recipes you wound up with?
It boggles the mind![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0009
rows.name:
I fear these names are all foreign to me, madam.
Could I trouble you to explain the foods to me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0010
rows.name:
What? Er, sure, I guess. I mean, I'm no expert,
but yeah. I can give you the basics.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0011
rows.name:
Sooo, curry. You take meat and vegetables and spices
and turn them into a rich stew, basically.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0012
rows.name: You can serve it with rice or bread or whatever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0013
rows.name:
Peking duck? Well, Peking was a place and duck was
a bird. The dish is one of those roasted whole.
Oranges are involved, I think.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0014
rows.name:
And the last one...potluck hot pot? Hoo boy. Yeah.
This one stretches the definition of "recipe" a bit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0015
rows.name:
You throw anything you want into a pot,
add whatever stock you have, and call it a day.
...That's it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0016
rows.name: Right then. Which one do you think he should learn?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_JNK0010
rows.name: Suggest Curry

rows.label: qev050505_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that Ni Zain should go with curry.

rows.label: qev050505_JNK0020
rows.name: Suggest Peking Duck

rows.label: qev050505_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that Ni Zain should go with Peking duck.

rows.label: qev050505_JNK0030
rows.name: Suggest Potluck Hot Pot

rows.label: qev050505_SEL0031
rows.name: Say that Ni Zain should go with the hot pot.

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0017
rows.name:
A savory stew of meat and vegetables...
Yes, that does sound intriguing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0018
rows.name:
My family used to make it when we went camping,
so I can vouch for it being easy to make in the field.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0019
rows.name: Roasting an animal whole sounds the simplest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0020
rows.name:
Yeah, except it's not JUST a matter of roasting it.
Cooking Peking duck's actually pretty laborious.
Oranges, remember? Also some other goo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0021
rows.name: Not to mention that you have to find a duck...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0022
rows.name: I can't say it's a very practical choice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0023
rows.name:
Surely a dish called a pot of luck will bring fortune to
my people in battle, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0024
rows.name:
Back on Earth, the word "potluck" was only exciting to
old grannies. It's funny seeing somebody so aggro get
so...amped about it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0025
rows.name: What is this "aggro"?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0026
rows.name:
Forget it. I'm not about to judge anyone for their likes
or dislikes. If it floats your boat, more power to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0027
rows.name:
But it's still a terrible recipe. Not a recipe at all, really.
It was silly of me to even include it in the running.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0028
rows.name:
So, all things considered, I think curry is our best
option.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0029
rows.name:
Understood! I would dearly like to try my hand at it.
Please, madam, train me in the ways of curry![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0030
rows.name:
I'd be happy to, buuuuut... Well, we can use my
kitchen and cooking utensils, but we're still short on
ingredients.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0031
rows.name:
An easy matter to resolve. It so happens we are in the
presence of a master of such searches, freshly done
with finding my sword AND the recipes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0032
rows.name: Saw that one coming.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0033
rows.name:
I trust you heard everything, yes? Then please, for the
sake of my people, go forth and gather the ingredients
to make curry![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0034
rows.name:
You're really getting the short end of this deal, huh?
Well, thanks I guess?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0035
rows.name: I am ever in your debt once more![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0036
rows.name: "Curry." Even the sound of it has an exotic flavor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0037
rows.name:
Despite hearing it described, I cannot quite imagine it.
Spices in general are foreign to the Wrothian palate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050505_MSG0038
rows.name:
I do not even know what one looks like.
It is a mystery...[ST:wait ]
